<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rockslide Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4349) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4340); earth is in your elemental philosophy

</column>

---

You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground. If the next action you use is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that affects an area, a number of 5-foot squares in the area equal to the spell rank become [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) for 1 round. These squares must be on the ground, and the entire area of difficult terrain must be contiguous. The spell gains the [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) trait.
name: Rockslide Spell
prerequisite: Elementalist Dedication; earth is in your elemental philosophy
